title: Pine64's Newest Linux Smartphone 'PinePhone Pro Explorer Edition' Now Available for Pre-Order - Slashdot
description:
"Linux fans rejoice!" writes Hot Hardware.  " Pine64's newest smartphone is officially available for pre-order."

PinePhone Pro Explorer Edition pre-orders opened up Tuesday. Devices that are pre-ordered before January 18th will be shipped from Pine64's Hong Kong warehouse by January 24th and should...
